Name: Rise
About the game: Leap through a charming and minimalist floating world in this first-person platformer. Face-off against the environment and fanciful adversaries using casual gameplay mechanics. Enjoy an inspiring soundtrack throughout all of the action. Solve and overcome challenges in a variety of levels. Survive an onslaught of outlandish enemies in the increasingly difficult Ascend mode. Master agility, perfect timing, exploit physics and collect rewards.
Meta Title: Rise: Jul 8, 2016, New State and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rise? Check out the release date (Jul 8, 2016), developer insights from New State, and a complete game summary.
